Anyway go=
od stuff. As for how you tape it (K.) thats the easy part same way ya tape =
all your other evp!
 
Keep up the good work. Frank is right. This really wi=
ll save people alot of money they would spend on other things. I dont even =
need a box yet I am tempted to go pick up a radio to hack just because you =
guys make it look so easy!
